text: facing the same challenges everyone is facing abandoned registrations.  finding that the membership functionality is incredible except for the process people are put though to become a member.

Ideally you would create a membership like almost all other software out there.  email, pw, confirm pw --> next (email confirm).  now relyig on the social auth beta.  wondering why Auth0 as a solution isn't viable.  Also wouldn't mind Okta or OneLogin but it's real pricey and I can see our community here having a solution that would make for a regrettable SSO tool investment for a simple use case.

Still finding it ridiculous to manually resend the reg email.  why not follow similar process as pw reset.  think about the logic.  If they can "reset" a password b/c the email has been validated then WHY NOT "set" the password from a validated email
Have I tried it all or is there something else left to try?
